data.value: Gets the '{0}' entities from the {1}. This property may be used as the source in a query expression.

data.name: dbmlFileTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access a database with the schema in a DBML file, using a LINQ-to-SQL mapping</summary><param name='File'>The DBML file containing the schema description</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param><param name='ContextTypeName'>The name of data context class (default: derived from database name)</param><param name='Serializable'>Generate uni-directional serializable classes (default: false, which means no serialization)</param>

data.name: sqlDataConnection
data.value: SQL connection

data.name: sqlDataConnectionInfo
data.value: Gets the connection used by the framework

data.name: sqlDataConnectionTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access a database, using a LINQ-to-SQL mapping</summary><param name='ConnectionString'>The connection string for the database connection. If using Visual Studio, a connection string can be found in database properties in the Server Explorer window.</param><param name='ConnectionStringName'>The name of the connection string for the database connection in the configuration file.</param><param name='LocalSchemaFile'>The local .dbml file for the database schema (default: no local schema file)</param><param name='ForceUpdate'>Require that a direct connection to the database be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)</param><param name='Pluralize'>Automatically pluralize or singularize class and member names using English language rules (default: false)</param><param name='Views'>Extract database views (default: true)</param><param name='Functions'>Extract database functions (default: true)</param><param name='ConfigFile'>The name of the configuration file used for connection strings (default: app.config or web.config is used)</param><param name='DataDirectory'>The name of the data directory, used to replace |DataDirectory| in connection strings (default: the project or script directory)</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param><param name='StoredProcedures'>Extract stored procedures (default: true)</param><param name='Timeout'>Timeout value in seconds to use when SqlMetal accesses the database (default: 0, which means infinite)</param><param name='ContextTypeName'>The name of data context class (default: derived from database name)</param><param name='Serializable'>Generate uni-directional serializable classes (default: false, which means no serialization)</param>

data.name: edmxFileTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access a database with the schema in an EDMX file, using a LINQ-to-Entities mapping</summary><param name='File'>The EDMX file containing the conceptual, storage and mapping schema descriptions</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param>

data.name: sqlEntityConnection
data.value: SQL Entity connection

data.name: sqlEntityConnectionTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access a database, using a LINQ-to-Entities mapping</summary><param name='ConnectionString'>The connection string for the database connection</param><param name='ConnectionStringName'>The name of the connection string for the database connection in the configuration file.</param><param name='LocalSchemaFile'>The local file for the database schema</param><param name='Provider'>The name of the ADO.NET data provider to be used for ssdl generation (default: System.Data.SqlClient)</param><param name='EntityContainer'>The name to use for the EntityContainer in the conceptual model</param><param name='ConfigFile'>The name of the configuration file used for connection strings (default: app.config or web.config is used)</param><param name='DataDirectory'>The name of the data directory, used to replace |DataDirectory| in connection strings (default: the project or script directory)</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param><param name='ForceUpdate'>Require that a direct connection to the database be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)</param><param name='Pluralize'>Automatically pluralize or singularize class and member names using English language rules (default: false)</param><param name='SuppressForeignKeyProperties'>Exclude foreign key properties in entity type definitions (default: false)</param>

data.name: connectionInfo
data.value: Gets the connection used by the object context

data.name: odataServiceCredentialsInfo
data.value: Gets or sets the authentication information used by each query for this data context object

data.name: odataServiceTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access an OData service</summary><param name="ServiceUri">The Uri for the OData service</param><param name='LocalSchemaFile'>The local .csdl file for the service schema</param><param name='ForceUpdate'>Require that a direct connection to the service be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param><param name='DataServiceCollection'>Generate collections derived from DataServiceCollection (default: false)</param>

data.name: wsdlServiceTypeHelp
data.value: <summary>Provides the types to access a WSDL web service</summary><param name='ServiceUri'>The Uri for the WSDL service</param><param name='LocalSchemaFile'>The .wsdlschema file to store locally cached service schema</param><param name='ForceUpdate'>Require that a direct connection to the service be available at design-time and force the refresh of the local schema file (default: true)</param><param name='ResolutionFolder'>The folder used to resolve relative file paths at compile-time (default: folder containing the project or script)</param><param name='MessageContract'>Generate Message Contract types (default: false)</param><param name='EnableDataBinding'>Implement the System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged interface on all DataContract types to enable data binding (default: false)</param><param name='Serializable'>Generate classes marked with the Serializable Attribute (default: false)</param><param name='Async'>Generate both synchronous and asynchronous method signatures (default: false, which means generate only synchronous method signatures)</param><param name='CollectionType'>A fully-qualified or assembly-qualified name of the type to use as a collection data type when code is generated from schemas</param>

data.value: static parameter '{0}' not found for type '{1}'

data.name: unexpectedMethodBase
data.value: unexpected MethodBase

data.value: Disposes the given context

data.value: {0} is not valid name for data context class

data.name: fixedQueriesNotSupported
data.value: The provided ServiceUri is for a data service that supports fixed queries. The OData type provider does not support such services.

data.name: dqsServicesNotSupported
data.value: Services that implement the Data Quality Services API are not supported.

data.name: invalidConnectionString
data.value: The supplied connection string should be either a valid provider-specific connection string or a valid connection string accepted by the EntityClient.

data.name: nonEquivalentConnectionString
data.value: Connection string presented in EntityClient format can differ only in provider-specific part.

data.name: noConfigFileFound1
data.value: A configuration string name was specified but no configuration file was found. Neither app.config nor web.config found in project or script directory.

data.name: noConfigFileFound2
data.value: A configuration string name was specified but the configuration file '{0}' was not found

data.name: noConnectionStringOrConnectionStringName
data.value: When using this provider you must specify either a connection string or a connection string name. To specify a connection string, use {0}<\"...connection string...\">.

data.name: notBothConnectionStringOrConnectionStringName
data.value: When using this provider you must specify either a connection string or a connection string name, but not both. To specify a connection string, use SqlDataConnection<\"...connection string...\">.

data.name: invalidProviderInConfigFile
data.value: Invalid provider '{0}' in connection string entry '{1}' in config file '{2}'. SqlDataConnection can only be used with provider 'System.Data.SqlClient'.

data.name: invalidConnectionStringInConfigFile
data.value: Invalid empty connection string '{0}' for the connection string name '{1}' in config file '{2}'

data.name: errorWhileReadingConnectionStringInConfigFile
data.value: An error occured while reading connection string '{0}' from the config file '{1}': '{2}'

data.name: serviceMetadataFileElementIsEmpty
data.value: ServiceMetadataFile element cannot be empty

data.name: invalidWsdlUri
data.value: The parameter 'ServiceUri' cannot be an empty string.

data.name: requiredToolNotFound
data.value: The required tool '{0}' could not be found.

data.name: dataDirectoryNotFound
data.value: The data directory '{0}' did not exist.

data.name: edmxFileRequiresDotNet45
data.value: File '{0}' requires .NET 4.5. To use this file please change project target framework to .NET 4.5.

data.name: connectionStringNotFound
data.value: Connection string '{0}' not found in configuration file.
